item.title: Tonia add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "Ford... you're turning into a penguin. Stop it." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Tonia add a quote by Erma Bombeck
item.description: "Sometimes I can't figure designers out. It's as if they flunked human anatomy." -- Erma Bombeck

item.title: Tonia add a quote by Dave Barry
item.description: "It is a well-documented fact that guys will not ask for directions. This is a biological thing. This is why it takes several million sperm cells... to locate a female egg, despite the fact that the egg is, relative to them, the size of Wisconsin." -- Dave Barry

item.title: Tonia add a quote by Dave Barry
item.description: "The problem with winter sports is that -- follow me closely here -- they generally take place in winter." -- Dave Barry

item.title: Tonia add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "Parents are not interested in justice, they're interested in peace and quiet." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Tonia add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Don't say you don't have enough time. You have exactly the same number of hours per day that were given to Helen Keller, Pasteur, Michaelangelo, Mother Teresa, Leonardo da Vinci, Thomas Jefferson, and Albert Einstein." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Tonia add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "We in America do not have government by the majority. We have government by the majority who participate." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Tonia add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "The man who reads nothing at all is better educated than the man who reads nothing but newspapers." -- Thomas Jefferson
